official_title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to perform a study of the structures, operations, practices and regulation of Japan's capital and securities markets, and their implications for the United States.
short_title: Foreign Capital and Securities Markets Study Act of 1993

summary.text: Foreign Capital and Securities Markets Study Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to study and report to the Congress on the capital and securities markets of Japan and their implications for and economic effects on the United States.

titles.title: Foreign Capital and Securities Markets Study Act of 1993

To require the Secretary of the Treasury to perform a study of the structures, operations, practices and regulation of Japan's capital and securities markets, and their implications for the United States.
